H5030.def: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity

H2216.def: = man; ► son of {L:Shealtiel<SDBH:שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל>} or, according to {S:01300301900000000} of {L:Pedaiah<SDBH:פְּדָיָה>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► governor of {L:Judea<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>} after the exile; according to {S:01300301900000000}, father of {L:Meshullam<SDBH:מְשֻׁלָּם>}, {L:Hananiah<SDBH:חֲנַנְיָה>}, and {L:Shelomith<SDBH:שְׁלֹמִית>}

H7597.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Jehoiachin<SDBH:יְהֹויָכִין>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:Zerubbabel<SDBH:זְרֻבָּבֶל>}

H6346.def: = a regional governor within a larger kingdom, responsible for enforcing the law of the king, collecting taxes for the king, and leading regional armies

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H3091.def: = man, also known as {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>}; Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H3087.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Seraiah<SDBH:שְׂרָיָה>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► father of {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}/{L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושׁוּעַ>}, high {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of exile

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

81.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H4310.def: = a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H5138.def: = a meal made by boiling vegetables or legumes in water

H3196.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well-being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex{N:001}

H8081.def: = high quality {L:oil<SDBH:שֶׁמֶן>}, ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness

H3978.def: = any nutritious substance that people or animals eat or drink ► in order to maintain life and growth

H6942.def: = action by which humans that are part of a {L:holy<SDBH:קָדֹושׁ>} nation set themselves apart from others by not engaging in activities that are not in accordance with God's law

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H3245.def: = causative action by which humans put in place the bottom part of a building or larger structure, usually below the ground level, which will have to bear the entire construction

H2233.def: = a flowering plant’s unit of reproduction, capable of developing into another such plant, in some cases also used as food

H1612.def: = a creeping plant, which grows along the ground until it finds a tree or other object to climb, using tendrils

H8384.def: = a tree that reaches a height of 5-8 m, with a round crown and very deep roots; its fruit is about the size of a hen’s egg and can be green, yellow, purple, or brown depending on the type; ◄ Ficus carica; ► the fruits are sweet and soft; ≈ the image of peace and happiness in Israel was: “every man under his vine and under his fig tree"

H7416.def: = a small tree reaching a height of 3-5 m, with narrow, dark green leaves and thorny branches; its has a red flower and produces red round fruits with a hard skin and tightly-packed pockets of seeds inside; ◄ Punica granatum; ► the seeds can be made into wine; the flower-shaped end of the fruit made it an attractive decoration on stone and in the temple; ≈ associated with love, beauty, and sex

H2132.def: = tree reaching up to 10 m. high, but usually pruned to around 5 m.; its leaves are grayish green above, and whitish underneath; its fruit is about 2 cm. long and a bit more than 1 cm. thick with a hard stone inside and a soft skin that covers the oily flesh; ► its fruit is used for food and oil for cooking, for lamps, for rubbing on the body, for medicine, and for anointing; ≈  regarded as beautiful and associated with well-being

H6086.def: = any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H2216.def: = man; ► son of {L:Shealtiel<SDBH:שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל>} or, according to {S:01300301900000000} of {L:Pedaiah<SDBH:פְּדָיָה>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► governor of {L:Judea<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>} after the exile; according to {S:01300301900000000}, father of {L:Meshullam<SDBH:מְשֻׁלָּם>}, {L:Hananiah<SDBH:חֲנַנְיָה>}, and {L:Shelomith<SDBH:שְׁלֹמִית>}

H6346.def: = a regional governor within a larger kingdom, responsible for enforcing the law of the king, collecting taxes for the king, and leading regional armies

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H8064.def: = the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

51.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H2015.def: = action by which humans turn their body around in order to face a different direction than before

H4467.def: = state in which a person or deity has been entrusted with the office of {L:king<SDBH:מֶלֶךְ>} or {L:queen<SDBH:מַלְכָּה>}

H3678.def: = large elaborate seat used by people in a position of authority or wealth

H8045.def: = causative action by which humans, deities, or events completely remove humans, animals, or objects from existence; ◄ by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, destruction, or direct divine intervention; ► often as punishment

H2392.def: = state in which humans or deities are strong in a physical, political, or military sense

H4818.def: = open vehicle with two or four wheels, pulled by one or more horses; ◄ made or wood and iron; ► used in war or for travelling

H7392.def: = action by which humans ride on a domestic animal such as a {L:donkey<SDBH:חֲמֹור>} or a {L:horse<SDBH:סוּס>} or in a {L:chariot<SDBH:מֶרְכָּבָה>}

H5483.def: = large domesticated solid-hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot

H3381.def: = process by which objects move (involuntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

H2719.def: = sharp object; ◄ made out of iron or flint; ► used as tool for various purposes

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

48.gl: a man ... his brother > one ... each other

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H5650.def: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

H2216.def: = man; ► son of {L:Shealtiel<SDBH:שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל>} or, according to {S:01300301900000000} of {L:Pedaiah<SDBH:פְּדָיָה>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► governor of {L:Judea<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>} after the exile; according to {S:01300301900000000}, father of {L:Meshullam<SDBH:מְשֻׁלָּם>}, {L:Hananiah<SDBH:חֲנַנְיָה>}, and {L:Shelomith<SDBH:שְׁלֹמִית>}

H7597.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Jehoiachin<SDBH:יְהֹויָכִין>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:Zerubbabel<SDBH:זְרֻבָּבֶל>}

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H2368.def: = engraved object; ◄ made out of metal; ► used to make a mark denoting ownership, approval, or closure of something (normally done by pressing into clay or heated wax and usually attached to a document or letter); sometimes worn on a chain around the neck, or in the form of a ring on one's hand; ≈ regarded as valuable and associated with exclusivity

H977.def: = action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events
